zombies.name: ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Zombie hates how his name makes him seem like an ordinary, well, zombie. He doesn't think of himself as some unnamed enemy or just another common corpse. He's an individual, damn it! And he's going to do something extraordinary, even if it kills you.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>普通のゾンビ。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>

zombies.name: コーンゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The Conehead Zombie has no clue what a traffic cone is. To it, it looks like an ice cream cone, and when it finds out it can't eat it, it just sticks it on its head.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>交通コーンのおかげで、彼は普通のゾンビよりもタフになっている。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+370</color>

zombies.name: 棒高跳びゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Once the best high jumper in his town, Pole Vaulting Zombie's career took a turn the day he forgot to set up the cushions behind the high jump stand.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>棒高跳びゾンビは棒を使って跳び越えます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>最初にぶつかった植物を飛び越えます。</color>

zombies.name: バケツゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Once upon a time, Buckethead Zombie, who was merely a painter, was hailed as a genius among zombies for his creative use of a bucket. Years have passed, and now the zombies wonder if he still has some secret killer tricks up his sleeve. Is he running out of ideas, or is he hiding something? Who knows?</color>
zombies.info:
<size=34>バケットハットのおかげでダメージに対する耐性が非常に高い。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1100</color>

zombies.name: 新聞ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"You can't fault him for being frustrated; he was just about to finish the crossword puzzle (vertical word number 23 is 'Brains'), which explains why he was holding the paper upside down."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>彼の新聞は限定的な防御力を提供します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+200</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>最初は普通の速度で移動しますが、新聞を失うと速度が上がります。</color>

zombies.name: おどつてるゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Dancing Zombie's athletic skills are average by zombie standards. On the advice of the Backup Dancers, he decided to pursue the idol path. Now, his pop song "Just Brains," a collaboration with Michael Jackson, is becoming a hit.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>跳び越えた後、バックダンサーを呼びます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>バックダンサーを4体召喚します。</color>

zombies.name: バックダンサー
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The four brothers, once troubled orphans, developed twisted personalities and bullied others at the Zombie Academy. One day, they saw Dancing Zombie performing joyfully on stage, and it changed them. From that moment, they joined him in performing on stage together.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>植物を乗り越える。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>

zombies.name: 網戸ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Screen Door Zombie, once an FBI task force member with a bad temper but a righteous heart, never negotiated with robbers—he'd just break down doors to save hostages. After becoming a zombie, his kind heart stayed the same. When he saw zombies kidnapping a little ghost zombie, he tried to break in, but they coated the door with glue, trapping his hand.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=34>前方から飛んでくる弾丸をブロックできます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1100</color>

zombies.name: ラグビーゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Football Zombie is a sports star among zombies, admired by many for his heroic presence on the field. Many companies want to hire him, but his salary demands are steep—an annual pay of 10,000 brains.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>非常に速く走ります。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1400</color>

zombies.name: マイケルゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Black suit, black hat—he's not here for a funeral. He's just a dancer, and you can call him Michael Zombie.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>華麗なダンスムーブで突撃を先導します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>一度に 4 体のおどつてるゾンビを召喚します。</color>

zombies.name: Duck Zombie NOT IN GAME
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>只有特定的僵尸才能成为鸭子救生圈僵尸，不是每只僵尸都能胜任。有些救生圈有点漏气，他们却处理不了，脱身后永远放弃了对脑子的渴求。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>可以在水里移动。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>

zombies.name: Coneduck Zombie NOT IN GAME
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>都说差生文具多，但是路障鸭子并不这么认为，毕竟他不想承认他是个差生。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>可以在水里移动。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>

zombies.name: Bucketduck Zombie NOT IN GAME
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>铁桶鸭子本不想带上那个漏气的游泳圈的，但是没办法，谁叫他戴着那个容易生锈的铁桶呢。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>可以在水里移动。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>

zombies.name: 潜水艦ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The formidable Zombarine, designed based on bionic principles, is both majestic and intimidating—a coveted war weapon for zombies. "Now we just need to tackle the issue of seaweed getting tangled in the propeller," said Dr. Edgar.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>水生植物に対するゾンビの主力の乗り物。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>

zombies.name: 学者ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>As a leading authority in the academic realm, Scholar Zombie is frequently seen in the library. His passion for reading runs deep, and disturbing him while he reads can spark his fury. This old gentleman will make sure you understand the true meaning of "knowledge is power."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>頑丈な本と共に大きなダメージを与える。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>400</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720+1100</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>本が壊れた後、短期間の無敵状態と移動速度が増加する。</color>

zombies.name: ゾンボニ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The zombie driving is an excellent driver, especially considering that few zombies can navigate from the ice rink to the grass field. Now, he must go pay the fine. The ice machine he operates isn't a Zamboni; it's a Zomboni produced by Company B.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>ゾンボニーは氷、蒸気、圧力を植物にかけます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>

zombies.name: シュノーケルゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Snorkel Zombie may have a broken mask, but that doesn't hinder his ability to dive and float in the water. His so-called "sinking" isn't due to his diving skills; he simply doesn't require air to breathe.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>スノーケルゾンビは水中を泳げます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>飛んでくる弾丸を避けるために水中に潜ります。</color>

zombies.name: ボブスレーゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>This car, designed by ski enthusiasts, drives smoothly on snow and ice, even achieving higher speeds than on grass. Unfortunately, it has a flaw: it can only be started on icy surfaces.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>フィールドに氷があるときだけ現れます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>2700</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>氷の上では非常に速く動きます。</color>

zombies.name: イルカ乗りゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Dolphin Rider Zombie is a part-time performer and dolphin keeper at an aquarium. The dolphin he rides is a zombie, but unlike typical zombies, this "zombie dolphin" has no desire for brains.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>イルカ乗りゾンビはイルカを使って防御を突破します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>最初にぶつかる植物を飛び越えます。</color>

zombies.name: トライデントゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Trident Zombie was originally just a regular javelin thrower who became a fisherman after retiring. However, when he went to the river to fish, he sank because he couldn't swim. When he came ashore, he realized he had become what he is now.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>トライデントを投げて植物を攻撃します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>トライデントを投げ、植物の現在の耐久力の20%（最低60）のダメージを与えます。</color>
<color=black>探索範囲：</color><color=#4B0082>前方3.5グリッド以上</color>

zombies.name: ダイモンド箱のゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Tonight, Diamond-box Zombies will unveil their dazzling world. Their eyes shine like the brightest stars in the night sky, and the golden light appears to flow like a river through time, illuminating the uncertain path ahead. Each time the lid of the box is gently opened, it feels like unlocking a door to another realm.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=33>これは…コーンヘッドゾンビですか？ 

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>4400</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>倒れると金箱のゾンビに変わります。</color>

zombies.name: 金箱のゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Underneath the golden box, other boxes in different colors await. Can you guess what the box inside is made from?"</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>これは…コーンヘッドゾンビですか？ 

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>2200</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>倒れると銀箱のゾンビに変わります。</color>

zombies.name: 銀箱のゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Silver-box Zombie thinks of the box on his head as a pot, so it must be one. Given his mindset, why don't you grasp his perspective? And you do see the exclamation mark on his box, right?</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>これは…コーンヘッドゾンビですか？ 

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1100</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>倒れるとコーンヘッドゾンビに変わります。</color>

zombies.name: ピエロゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Although Jack-in-the-Box Zombie is a mental patient, the circus welcomed his application. Be wary of what's in his toy box; it's sure to scare you.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>このゾンビは爆発物を持っています。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>時々爆発して周囲の植物を即死させます。</color>

zombies.name: 風船ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Balloon Zombie, one of the Zomppelin creators, frequently gets asked why he's tied balloons to himself. His usual reply is, "That was my conclusion." However, the truth is that the balloons simply got tangled by chance.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=33>風船ゾンビは戦闘の上空を浮遊し、ほとんどの攻撃に免疫があります。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+20</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>飛行中はほとんどの植物からダメージを受けません。</color>

zombies.name: 飛空艇ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>The Zomppelin, Dr. Edgar's latest creation, is quickly becoming the zombies' trusted ally. Speculation abounds about who will pilot this powerful weapon—perhaps the imp or even the airship itself? "It's just a balloon," Dr. Edgar remarked. "Zombies need to keep up with the times. I'm even considering turning it into a drone to avoid embarrassment when defeated by plants."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>植物の上を飛ぶと、致命的な爆弾を落とします。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>1000</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>

zombies.name: クジラ乗りゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=30><color=black>The white whale that Yeti Zombie rides has impressive jumping skills. Dolphin Rider Zombie is quite envious and has always wanted to borrow it for a ride, but Yeti Zombie refuses each time. "Yeti Zombie has no control over his white whale," Dr. Edgar said. "He always wants to hide behind me, but the white whale ends up going the other way."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=30>3グリッド前方にジャンプしてから戻り、後ろから植物を攻撃します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>背の高いナッツではブロックできません。</color>

zombies.name: 掘り手ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=34><color=black>A long time ago, Digger Zombies despised Magnet-shrooms for constantly confiscating their tools. Now, they hate Miner Pumpkins even more. "My head keeps getting hit, which makes me feel even worse," he laments.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=34>このゾンビは掘って防御を回避します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>地下を掘り進み、芝生の左側に現れます。磁石キノコに弱いです。</color>

zombies.name: バックコプターゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=34><color=black>"Friends, did you know about the Berlin airship? It inspired my design…" All the zombies want to hide from Buckecopter Zombie, not only because he talks too much about the airship, but also because the noise from his balloon's propeller is unbearable.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=34>バケコプターゾンビはブロバーを恐れません！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+2200+500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>上部のプロペラがブロバーの風を打ち消します。</color>

zombies.name: キングピエロゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=31><color=black>For every clown zombie, self-destruction is the highest form of art, and King Clown excels above all. "King Clown will never take off his mask or let go of the gift box in his hand!"</color>
zombies.info:
<size=31>キングピエロゾンビは死後に爆発することがあります！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720+370</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>爆発後、暴力的になり、速度が倍増します。また、自己破壊してピエロゾンビに変身することがあります。爆発が早いほど、死亡する確率が高くなります。</color>

zombies.name: カタパルトゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Nobody knows how Catapult Zombie manages to throw with such precision, but one thing's for sure—if you see him, cover your head quickly!</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>あなたの植物を攻撃するためにバスケットボールを発射します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>850</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>バスケットボールを投げて、60ダメージを与えます。</color>

zombies.name: ポゴゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Pogo Zombie love to hop around, thinking that jumping toward the sky is as close as they'll ever get to flying. But no one told them not to use a trampoline on the roof...</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>防御を飛び越えることができるゾンビです。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>植物を飛び越えることができます。</color>

zombies.name: 梯子ゾンビ
zombies.introduce:
<size=32><color=black>Ladder Zombie heard online that with a ladder and some work clothes, he could sneak past any defenses. Armed with a ladder and dressed like a worker, he sets out to conquer the plant defenses.
Peashooter's comment: "Didn't anyone tell him that his zombie skin is way too noticeable...?"</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>このゾンビは梯子を使って障害物を回避します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720+720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>梯子を使って植物の防御を無視することができます。</color>

zombies.name: ポゴスイカゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Quote: "It's highly unlikely for shells to explode in the same crater twice! This is what ‘Crater Theory' states." Pogo Melon Zombie says while adjusting his melon peel hat. However, no one told him that his red-and-green color scheme stands out a bit too much in a crowd of zombies.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>このゾンビはチャージして防御に飛び込んできます！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+2200</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>5秒間チャージしてから、大きなジャンプをします。</color>

zombies.name: ガーガンチュア
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The Gargantuar is like a massive, clumsy beast, its size an advantage at the cost of intelligence. It doesn't understand plants or brains; it only knows how to move forward, relentlessly. </color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>巨大で遅いゾンビで、その巨大な体で全てを押しつぶします。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>

zombies.name: 超級ガーガンチュア
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Although the Giga-gargantuar wreaks havoc on the battlefield, its blood-red eyes instilling fear in all who face it, there's a little-known secret: the monster is perpetually irritable due to chronic sleep deprivation.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>怒ったガーガンチュアは、恐ろしい力で道を踏み潰します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>

zombies.name: インプ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Imps enjoy sneaking through tight spaces, often causing mischief. Don't be surprised if you see one bouncing around unexpectedly!</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>小さくてこっそりしたインプは、狭い場所にすばやく入り込むのが得意で、敏捷でターゲットにしにくいです。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>

zombies.name: メカ・ガーガンチュア
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>A zombie from the popular Plant Girls vs Zombies.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>ドクター・ゾンボスの別の発明で、凍結には免疫があり、躊躇せずに防御に突進します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>コントロール効果に免疫があり、撃退されても動き続けますが、磁石キノコには弱いです。</color>

zombies.name: メカ・超級ガーガンチュア
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>A zombie from the popular Plant Girls vs Zombies.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>ドクター・ゾンボスの最新の発明で、この機械化されたバージョンは凍結に免疫があり、防御に直接突進します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>コントロール効果に免疫があり、撃退されても動き続けますが、磁石キノコには弱いです。</color>

zombies.name: メカボーリングゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=32>
zombies.info:
<size=29.5>ゾンビ側の転がるボウリングボール。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>植物に当たると方向を変え、坂を下ると速くなります。1000ヘルス以下の植物を押しつぶし、強靭な植物には1000ダメージを与え、曲がると減速します。傘の葉の融合で止めることができます。倒れると5匹のインプを召喚します。</color>
<color=black>ドロップ：</color><color=#4B0082>1/3の確率で氷ボール、炎ボール、またはメカ断片をドロップします。</color>

<color=black>ボールは植物を押しつぶし、最大30発の弾丸をブロックするか、30秒間持続します。氷属性または火属性の植物融合で対抗可能です。</color>

zombies.name: 装甲ガーガンチュア
zombies.introduce: <size=26><color=black>The Armored Gargantuar is a big fan of a skin called 'Cavalier' from his favorite game. So, he spent a fortune custom-ordering a set of medieval armor tailored just for him. However, when he tried to take it off, he found it was stuck for good... And that's how he ended up with a permanent 'Cadavelier' skin.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=28>メイスで地面を叩くたびにインプを召喚します！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>8000+24000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>通常のガーグの半分の速度で移動し、一撃で5000以上のダメージを受けません。魅了効果の持続時間は半分、HPが半分になるとメカナットボールを投げ、地面を叩くたびに1～3体のインプを召喚します。</color>

zombies.name: バンジーゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <color=black>バンジーゾンビはリスクを取るのが大好きだ。だって、ちょっとくらい生き生きしなきゃ、死んでる意味がないだろ？</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>空から降下し、植物を奪う。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>

zombies.name: イエティゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36>
zombies.info:
<size=36>イエティゾンビは時々逃げることがある。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>周囲3×3範囲の植物を凍結・停止させる。</color>

zombies.name: オニゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36>
zombies.info:
<size=36>オニゾンビは強固な装甲を持つ。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>8888+8888</color>
<color=black>弱点：</color><color=#4B0082>爆竹</color>

zombies.name: エンドウシューターゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The ability of Peashooter Zombie to engage from a distance often frightens the plants. However, the real panic lies with the zombies, who fear that those fighting in front of him will be targeted from behind.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>植物を攻撃するためにエンドウ豆を発射します。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>20</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270</color>

zombies.name: チェリーシューターゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Cherryshooter Zombie is a 17-year-old high school student with a plant head growing from his neck. His favorite fruit is cherries, and due to his papal family background, the zombies affectionately refer to him as the "Leaf King."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>植物を攻撃するためにチェリー弾を発射します。
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>60</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>500</color>

zombies.name: チェリー爆弾シューターゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Explod-o-shooter Zombie loves listening to "Cherry Bomb" by The Runaways, which might explain his fiery passion. However, no one knows how he learned to ignite fireworks with his mouth.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>植物を攻撃するために爆発チェリーを発射します。
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>1000</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>500</color>

zombies.name: ナッツゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Following an assault by the plants, Wall-nut Zombie displayed bite marks on his head instead of bullet holes. When interviewed, he said, "Perhaps my comrades were simply hungry."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>動くナッツです。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1100</color>

zombies.name: チェリー新聞ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=30><color=black>This zombie's favorite fruit is cherries, and even his newspaper is cherry-flavored. The newspaper he holds is the only thing that can temper his rage.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=30>新聞が壊れると爆発チェリーの弾幕を展開します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1500+720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>新聞が壊れた後、一時的に無敵になり、0.75秒ごとに爆発チェリーを発射します。</color>
<color=black>爆発範囲： </color><color=#4B0082>クロススプラッシュ、ナッツで吸収可能。</color>

zombies.name: 謎の箱ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>？？？</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>箱の中に何が隠れているのかは誰にもわかりません。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+370</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>箱が落ちた後、元のゾンビの耐久力の20%/40%/60%/80%/100%のランダムなゾンビを召喚します。</color>

zombies.name: バックナッツゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=35><color=black>Why is Buck-nut Zombie's head made of iron? It's because everyone said that eating walnuts nourishes the brain, but he didn't realize that the walnuts he consumed were packed with too much iron. However, it might not be so bad—at least now he has developed an iron head.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=35>動くバッカーナッツです。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+2200</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>弾丸で倒されるとバケツが落ちます。</color>

zombies.name: チェリーナッツゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Real men never turn around to watch explosions, and Cherry-nut Zombie certainly fits the bill, as he often catches bombs with his face.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>爆発弾に対して若干の耐性があります。


<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1100</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>爆発による最大ダメージは150です。.</color>

zombies.name: バックシューターゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Last year, Buckshooter Zombie drew a tarot card that read "The Emperor." Since then, he has been able to shoot iron bullets at will.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>高ダメージの弾丸を発射します。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>80</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1350</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>弾丸で倒されるとバケツが落ちます。</color>

zombies.name: ラグビーナッツゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=35><color=black>Rugby-nut Zombie was once just an ordinary Football Zombie, until one day he collided with a nut that was spreading fertilizer. "I don't know how this guy ended up on my head; it's suffocating me!" lamented Rugby-nut Zombie.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=35>非常に速く走ることができる高耐久ゾンビ。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+4400</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>弾丸で倒されるとラグビーヘルメットが落ちます。</color>

zombies.name: 金の謎の箱ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>？？！</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>ゴールドのもの!? このミステリーボックスの中身は何だろう…

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>箱が落ちた後、完全な耐久力を持つランダムなゾンビを召喚します。</color>

zombies.name: 氷ナッツゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Frost-nut Zombie's head has sparked numerous opinions in the zombie world. Some say he aims to distance himself from the cold world, while others suspect it relates to Dr. Edgar's wild experiments. Yet, only he knows that this headgear appeared after he ate a specific blue mushroom.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>アイスプロジェクタイルによるダメージを無効化できる頑丈なゾンビ。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+2200</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>氷や氷のプロジェクタイルに対する免疫。.</color>

zombies.name: チェリーボムパルトゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=35><color=black>Warning: Before he uses up all his basketballs, make sure to run, as his explosive basketballs will cause chaos!</color>
zombies.info:
<size=35>爆発的なバスケットボールを投げて防御を破壊します！
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>5つのバスケットボールを投げた後、爆発的なバスケットボールを発射します。爆発的なバスケットボールはアンブレラプラントに100ダメージを与えます。.</color>

zombies.name: クジラ乗りシューター
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>What makes this fella special compared to the whale rider yeti? Pea Rider replies, I just really enjoy playing Boomerang.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>クジラ乗りゾンビのバリエーション！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>ジャンプ前後でエンドウ豆を植物に発射します。</color>

zombies.name: 網戸バックシューター
zombies.introduce: <color=black>網戸バックシューターは、いつも鉄の装備を山ほど積み込むため、他のゾンビたちは呆れている。「磁石キノコが頭まで引っこ抜くなら、最初から金属をもっと持てばいいんじゃね？」その突飛な理論は、一見正しいように思えた——磁力ブロバーに出会うまでは。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>「バックシューターゾンビが装備を獲得: 鉄の網戸！」

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>80</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1250+1100+1100</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>鉄のエンドウ豆を絶え間なく発射しながら、そこそこの耐久力を持つ。<</color>

zombies.name: スクワッシュゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <color=black>「ん？ んん！」スクワッシュゾンビは、一切迷うことなく突撃し、道を阻む植物を押し潰す。その自己犠牲的な姿勢に、他のゾンビたちは感動している。しかし、実際のところ彼らはただの猫スクワッシュのファンなのだ。彼女がエンドフレイムを粉砕するのを見てしまったが最後、真似せずにはいられなかったのである。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>最寄りの植物を押し潰し、即死する。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>最初に遭遇した植物を押し潰す。</color>

zombies.name: 辛いスクワッシュゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <color=black>辛いスクワッシュゾンビは、ゾンビの中でも最も血の気の多い存在だ。出現した瞬間にやることは？ もちろん、他のゾンビを蹴散らすことだ！ 本当は目立つ場所に立ち、「塵は塵に！」と叫ぶ予定だった。しかし、彼の頭のほうがさらに熱かったため、叫ぶ前にすっ飛んでしまった。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>ジャンプして、一レーンの全体の植物を破壊！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>最初に遭遇した植物を押し潰し、一レーンの全体を炎上させ、すべての植物を焼き尽くす。ただし、冷却状態では炎上しない。 
シークレットゾンビ。特定のレベルでのみ出現。</color>

zombies.name: ハラペーニョゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <color=black>チリゾンビは燃え上がる情熱でプールにダイブする。しかし、他のゾンビたちはうんざりしている。「おいおい、これじゃただの激辛スープじゃねえか……」</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>しばらくすると爆発し、レーンの全体の植物を破壊する。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>一定時間後に爆発し、レーンの全体の植物を破壊する。</color>

zombies.name: エンドウ大将ラグビー
zombies.introduce: <color=black>エンドウ大将ラグビーが死ぬ前の最後の記憶は、ベジタリアン向けのバッティングセンターに迷い込み、ピッチングマシンを誤って丸呑みしたことだった。今となっては、止まることなくエンドウ豆を撃ち出し続けるしかない。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>防衛線に容赦ないエンドウ豆の猛攻を浴びせる！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+1400</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>絶え間なくエンドウ豆の弾幕を発射する。</color>

zombies.name: ロボ魚
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"An excellent diver should not only be able to dive but also drive a super submarine!" declared Sharkmarine Zombie as he increased the submarine's horsepower by one gear.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>このゾンビはあるロボット魚に関連していると聞きました。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>

zombies.name: マイケルゾンボニ
zombies.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Michael Zomboni is not just one zombie; it's a team effort. Zomboni sets up the venue, Bobsled Zombie provides the visual effects, and Michael Zombie... was compelled to leave the car because it didn't have a driver's license to greet its passionate plant fans, but the peas seemed a little too excited.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=30>非常に高い防御力とスロー耐性。
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>死亡時に自動的にマイケルゾンビ、ゾンボニ、ボブスレーゾンビを召喚します。</color>

zombies.name: 超級トライデントゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=31.5><color=black>"Giga-trident Zombie is a skilled fisherman known for his exceptional accuracy with the four tridents he throws, earning him the title of the king of fishermen." "In fact, I used to be a part-time javelin thrower..." Giga-trident Zombie admitted.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=31.5>一度に大量のトライデントを植物に投げます。
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+7500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>4つのトライデントを投げ、それぞれが植物に現在の耐久力の20%（最低60）のダメージを与えます。</color>

zombies.name: ガチェリートリング新聞ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=28><color=black>"I'm getting old..." ガチェリートリング新聞ゾンビ lamented while walking through the street. Despite containing his pressure, it was enough to keep both plants and zombies down. "Only that guy can still inspire me to fight..." he muttered as he put away the newspaper and ambled on.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=29>莫大なダメージを与える。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>400→1000（激怒された）</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1500+1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>新聞が破られると一時的に無敵になり、0.125秒ごとに爆発性のサクランボを発射します。</color>

zombies.name: 超級ラグビーナッツゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Stepping out of the shadows, the Giga Rugby-nut Zombie radiates power, coldness, and a sinister vibe. He adamantly keeps the secret of his strength to himself, asserting that only the darkest darkness can create a being as formidable as he. "Where is my paint?" Dr. Edgar asked, looking perplexed in his laboratory.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>古い友人？もしかして、以前に会ったことがあるかもしれません。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>100</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000+12000</color>

zombies.name: キーロフ飛空艇
zombies.introduce: <size=28><color=black>Was that a huge flying object? No, it was actually a gigantic airship, featuring a sturdy shell and the ability to release a squadron of fighters. Even when destroyed, the airship could still wreak havoc on surrounding creatures, causing other zombies to keep their distance, fearing that a crash might send them to their demise.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>キーロフ出撃！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>毎秒キーロフドローンを召喚します。死亡時に墜落し、植物に大きなダメージを与えます。</color>

zombies.name: キーロフドローン
zombies.introduce: <size=35><color=black>This is no ordinary aircraft; it is a special plane that has been compressed through water pressure. While the exact method of compression remains a mystery, its battlefield strength rivals that of conventional bombers.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=35>キーロフドローンは高速で飛び、飛行中に植物に爆弾を落とします。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>1000</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>200</color>

zombies.name: スーパースターマイケル
zombies.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Superstar Zombie, a legendary idol in the zombie world, has extremely high standards for himself. After completing his studies at Edgar's Dance Academy, he mastered the Super Moonwalk, which was named "The Sixth Wonder of the Zombie World," earning him a large fanbase.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>防御に滑り込む高速ゾンビ。強力な敵です。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>戦場に滑り込む際にダメージを90%軽減します。その後、おどつてるゾンビを召喚します。</color>

zombies.name: キョンシー
zombies.introduce: <size=30><color=black>This monster survived the harshest conditions and possesses enormous strength. It avoids brains and roams the world in search of a secluded place.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=30>千年前の亡霊、非常に強力な存在。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>時折短い距離をダッシュし、通過した植物に500ダメージを与えます。死亡時には3×3の範囲で植物に500ダメージを与えます（カボチャで守られた植物を除く）。</color>

zombies.name: ポゴキングピエロ
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"I just wanted to follow the trend with this look," Pogo King Clown says with a shrug whenever his cool appearance comes up. But everyone knows he once had a love story that left a deep mark on him.</color></size>
zombies.info:
<size=36>ポゴスティックに爆弾が隠されています。
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270+4400</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>跳躍中に死亡すると爆発し、キングピエロゾンビに変身します。</color></size>

zombies.name: 超級メカボーリング
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Fish balls? Mecha armor? That’s all that matters," says Giga Mecha-nut Zombie. Sporting an impressive mechanical suit, he feels that’s all he really needs.</color></size>
zombies.info:
<size=36>超級メカボーリングは方向を変えることができます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color></size>

zombies.name: 黒曜石ガーガンチュア
zombies.introduce: <size=26><color=black>By ancient writ, it is recorded that the abyssal obsidian armor may only be borne by a body tempered through trials of bitter frost and searing flame. When the kin of zombies art plunged into utmost peril, his visage may yet appear at the heart of the dreadest battlefield. 'Stir not great commotion, lest ye rouse the giant that slumbereth beneath the earth.' A warning to the plants.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=30>古代で邪悪かつ不気味な脅威。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>8000+24000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>画面上のすべてのゾンビに90%のダメージ軽減を提供し、地面を叩くたびにシャドウインプを召喚します。また、装甲ガーグの他のスペシャルも引き継ぎます。</color>

zombies.name: シャドウインプ
zombies.introduce: <size=35><color=black>With a flashy entrance featuring winged blades and a death roll, the Abyssal Imp meticulously designed this stunt for the mini-pterosaur's role in Hollytomb's latest hit Jurassic Zombies. Little does anyone know, he was actually just accidentally flung out.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=35>シャドウインプは簡単に防御を突破できます。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>200</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1500</color>

zombies.name: クジラ乗りガトリング
zombies.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Gatling Explod-o-rider Zombie always wakes up in a terrible mood — especially when a whale riding colleague drags him to work. Fueled by rage, he's ready to blow away any plants in his path before heading back for a nap.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>ジャンプして防御を破壊し、爆発性のサクランボを発射します！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>芝生に侵入して3秒後に爆発性のチェリー爆弾を発射し始めます。</color>

zombies.name: ダイヤモンドの謎の箱
zombies.introduce: <size=36><color=black>！！！</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>悪夢か、あるいは祝福をランダムに召喚します...？

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>20000+1100</color>

zombies.name: トライデントの火車
zombies.introduce: <color=black>トライデントの火車ゾンビは、不死族の「完璧主義者」だ。彼は自分の乗り物がちょっとみすぼらしいと思い、トライデントを積み始めた。そして、完璧を求めるあまり、すべてのスロットが埋まるまで止まらなかった。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>一斉射撃で防衛を粉砕する！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350+4400</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>1回の攻撃で14本のトライデントを連続発射し、少し間を置いてさらに14本発射する（合計2回の連射）。トライデントは植物を直接狙わず、固定の角度と速度で飛び、当たった植物にダメージを与える。</color>

zombies.name: 超級おどつてるゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <color=black>超級おどつてるゾンビの驚異的な棒高跳びスキルに、すべてのゾンビが驚嘆する。「ああ、これは俺の才能さ」と彼は言う。しかし真実は、彼が毎日二つの仕事を掛け持ちしていることにある。「仕事が2倍なら、ジャンプも2倍さ」</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>2タイルを飛び越えられる。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>2タイルを飛び越えられるが、背の高いナッツによって阻止できる。</color>

zombies.name: 腐潮ゾンビ王
zombies.introduce: <color=black></color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>神のトライデントを投げつけて防衛を破壊する！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>8000+24000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>煉獄モードで対応する効果を選択した場合のみ出現。ヒプノやチョンパーに無効化されず、1回の攻撃で5000以上のダメージを受けない。出現中、超級トライデントゾンビが継続的に攻撃し、すべてのトライデントのダメージが5倍になる。彼の投げるトライデントは固定の角度で飛び、多くの植物を即死させる（ダメージの転送が可能）。着弾後は最大300発の飛び道具をブロックし、30秒後に消滅するか、破壊されない場合は周囲の植物に大ダメージを与える。</color>

zombies.name: 究極メカボーリング
zombies.introduce: <size=30><color=black>究極メカボーリングは、元々超級メカボーリング小型で精密なバージョンとして設計された。しかし、設計図の寸法にミスがあり…結果としてとんでもなく巨大なものが生まれた。技術者たちは失敗に気づいたものの、もう手遅れだったので、そのまま「転」がるように受け入れた。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>フィールド上のすべてのゾンビの盾となる！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>煉獄モードで対応する効果を選択した場合のみ出現。ヒプノやチョンパーに無効化され、1回の攻撃で5000以上のダメージを受けない。フィールド上のすべてのゾンビ（謎の箱ゾンビたちを除く）に対してダメージを肩代わりする。無敵フレームを持ち、0.2秒ごとに1回のみダメージを受ける。</color>

zombies.name: <size=28>究極ラグビーストライカー
zombies.introduce: <color=black></color>
zombies.info:
<size=31>究極ラグビーストライカーが防衛を容易に打ち崩す！

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>200</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>8000+24000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>撃退、ヒプノ、チョンパーに無効化され、1回の攻撃で5000以上のダメージを受けない。出現中、すべての植物は回復不能になり、回復を試みるとその回復量の0.1倍のダメージをギガラグビーストライカーに与える。非防衛系の植物を噛みつくと即死させ、通常のギガラグビーナッツゾンビに変える。3秒ごとに以下の能力を獲得する（重複可）：
1. 攻撃力が2倍になる。
2. 防具の耐久力を6000回復する。 
3. 移動速度が0.3上昇（最大3まで）。（出現時のゾンビ速度範囲：0.9 - 1.8）</color>

zombies.name: 裂空者メカ
zombies.introduce: <color=black></color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>裂空者メカは爆弾を投下し、キーロフを召喚して防衛を壊滅させる。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>煉獄モードで対応する効果を選択した場合のみ出現。撃退、ヒプノ、チョンパー、そして磁力サボテンによる航空機撃墜に無効化され、1回の攻撃で5000以上のダメージを受けない。地上にいる間は高速で突進し、通過した植物を粉砕する（粉砕のメカニズムはゾンボニーと同様）。耐久力が2/3を下回ると、一時的な無敵フレームを得て飛行を開始し、3秒ごとにキーロフ飛空艇を召喚。爆弾を投下し、着弾時に3×3範囲にダメージを与える（ダメージタイプはピエロ箱の爆発と同じ、ピエロのパンプキンには無効）。</color>

zombies.name: <size=26>マイケルのスーパーライブ移動車
zombies.introduce: <color=black>この精巧に作られたステージでは、ジャクソン・ワールドワイドがあらゆる批判を無視し、パフォーマンスに完全に没頭できる。植物とゾンビの両方に最後の歌とダンスを披露した後、ステージは崩れ去る。</color>
zombies.info:
<size=30>ジャクソン・ワールドワイドは、舞台とツアーへの情熱に生涯を捧げてきた。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>32000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>煉獄モードで対応する効果を選択した際にのみ登場。ヒプノスやチョンパーの効果を受けず、ダメージ軽減計算前の一撃で受けるダメージは最大5000まで。周囲のゾンビに冷凍無効を付与し、数秒ごとスーパースターマイケルを4体召喚する。倒されると、マイケルゾンボニニ2体とスーパースターマイケル1体をスポーンする。</color>

zombies.name: チェリーズ教授
zombies.introduce: <color=black></color>
zombies.info:
<size=32>チェリーズ教授は科学的な遺物、特に爆発物の研究に執着している。チェリージラはもともと彼の発明だったという噂も…

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1200+12000+1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#4B0082>煉獄モードで対応する効果を選択した際にのみ登場。撃退、ヒプノ、チョンパーの影響を受けず、一撃で受けるダメージは最大5000まで。新聞が破壊されるまでは無敵状態。新聞を失うと短時間無敵になり、最大30体のゾンビを怒れるチェリーシューター新聞ゾンビに変化させる。その後、チェリーの弾幕を放ち、最終列へチェリーを発射しながら突進する。スパイクウィードに触れると即座に新聞を失う（未破壊の場合）。</color>

zombies.name: Dr. Zomboss
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Edgar George Zomboss achieved his Doctorate in Thanatology in only two years. Quickly mastering thanatological technology, he built his fearsome Zombot and set about establishing absolute dominance of his local subdivision.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Dr. Zomboss rules them all.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>60000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Drops a trophy upon defeat. Incoming damage is capped at 5000 before reduction. Immune to most status effects, except Chill, Freeze, and Enflamed. Has multiple attack modes:
<color=black>•</color> Deploys regular zombies on the right half of the lawn.
<color=black>•</color> Stomps on plants in the rightmost 4 columns.
<color=black>•</color> Releases rolling ice and fireballs that crush plants in a lane.
<color=black>•</color> Drops 3 Bungee Zombies on the left half of the lawn.
<color=black>•</color> At half health, starts to throw campers that crush all plants in a 2x3 area.</color>

zombies.name: Dr. Zomboss Auric Prime
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In non consectetur odio, ac consectetur dui.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Plants vs. Zombies: Fusion Edition

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>60000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Inherits all traits from Dr. Zomboss. Additionally, disables player's gloves and mallet on appearance. Mallet is unlocked at 2/3 health. Gloves are unlocked at 1/3 health. Thrown campers also clears the conveyor belt.</color>
<size=36>Fusion Formula: <color=#4B0082>Dr. Zombie + Trophy</color>

zombies.name: Frost Legion Snowball Launcher
zombies.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Snowball fight!" Snowball Launcher Zombie wakes up from his icy slumber, flinging snowballs wildly in every direction.

"Should we tell him?"
"Nah, let’s see how long it takes him to figure it out."

SMACK!—Another snowball lands.

"That makes fourteen."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Snowball Launcher Zombie can attack your plants with snowballs and freeze them.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>20/2s</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to Chill and Freeze. Vulnerable to Deep Chill.
<color=black>•</color> After appearing, it will continually launch snowballs at plants, which will deal 20 damage and explode upon impact, disabling plants for 5s in a 3×3 range. Snowballs inflict 10 Cryo points to hypnotized zombies affected.</color>
<color=black>Weakness: </color><color=#4B0082>Umbrella Rind</color>

zombies.name: Frost Legion Shieldbearer
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Frost Legion Shieldbearer was once an elite soldier on the battlefield. Now retired, he’s the reigning champion of the graveyard snowball fight tournament. He treasures the shield that brought him so much glory, constantly checking it for scratches—though some say that very habit might be what got him injured and retired in the first place.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A shieldbearer from the snowy plains, he deflects straight-firing projectiles and returns them as snowballs.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720 + 2200 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to Chill and Freeze. Vulnerable to Deep Chill.
<color=black>•</color> Raises shield every 1.5s to reflect straight-firing projectiles as snowballs. Takes 20 damage when reflecting and does not block the projectile. Delivers shield bashes instead of biting when holding the shield, dealing 50 damage.</color>

zombies.name: Frost Legion Trident Thrower
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>At the ongoing 5th Undead Olympics Winter Games, Frost Legion Trident Thrower hogs all the spotlight. He plans to use his prize money to buy a new sled for himself and his crew—and maybe treat them to a luxurious foot massage to make up for all the damage from stepping on Spikeweeds.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>From the snowy plains comes the Frost Legion Trident Thrower — silencing foes with every icy toss!

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to Chill and Freeze. Vulnerable to Deep Chill.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from Trident Zombie. Ice Tridents are not attracted to Umbrellas and apply Silence for 5s on hit.</color>

zombies.name: Chronoporter Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>What exactly is behind the portal held by the Chronoporter Zombie? No zombie really knows — nor do they care to find out. But when their old pals start crawling out one after another, they're more than happy to step up and ask if there's any fresh brains inside.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A force beyond time and space, drawn from the edges of reality itself.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>20/1.5s</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270 + 200 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Fires chrono peas at your defense. Every 6s, randomly summons a regular, Conehead, Buckethead, or Screen Door zombie from the portal. Drops a Chrono Core upon death.</color>

zombies.name: Frost Legion Floating Disk
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Before every liftoff, the crew of the Floating Disk spends half an hour clearing snow and ice — and dragging out the Snowfurs hiding in the corners. "Getting this frozen lump off the ground eats up a ridiculous amount of fuel," the pilot grumbles.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>It’s snowing! This chilly guest drifts in with flurries, silences plants, and leaves with backup.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Immune to Blover. Creates snowflakes while moving, silencing plants below. Slows down over time — when speed reaches zero, reverses direction. Upon exit, summons a Frost Legion Squad: one each of Shieldbearer, Snowball Launcher, and Trident Thrower Zombies.</color>

zombies.name: Frost Legion Blockhead Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"In the freezing Snowy Plains, keeping warm is essential. In fact, ice makes a great insulator," Blockhead Zombie proudly tells the others—but no one takes his advice. He doesn't seem to notice that ice is also a great soundproofing material.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A legionnaire zombie wearing an iceblock helmet.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>500 + 370 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Immune to Chill and Freeze. Vulnerable to Deep Chill.</color>

zombies.name: Snowfur
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Research into the biological classification of Snowfurs has seen little progress. After all, you can't expect zombies—who lack brains—to be academically sharp. Most can’t even tell a real Snowfur from a Yeti Zombie in a Snowfur pelt. Thankfully, Dr. Edgar offered a brilliant method: 'The smarter-looking one is the Snowfur.'</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A neutral creature native to the snowy plains.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>When zombies destroy an Iceblock with no corresponding Zombotany, a Snowfur appears. Moves very slowly, crushes plants, but does not directly attack.</color>

zombies.name: Elder Snowfur
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Stronger, wiser, and with a heavier tail than other snow beasts, what truly made him leader was his remarkable leap — guiding his kin to the source of the frozen waterfall.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Apex of the snowy plains.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>When zombies destroy an Iceblock with no corresponding Zombotany, a Snowfur appears, with a 1/4 chance of it being an Elder Snowfur. Moves very slowly and crushes plants. Dashes 2 tiles forward on appearance, ignoring plants.</color>

zombies.name: Miner Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I don’t want to live in this world," Miner Zombie laments, finding no joy in his monotonous life. He just wants to dig up enough obsidian to build a portal and leave. Not to mention that the other side of the portal is even more dangerous and monotonous, he has no chance of lighting the portal at all. The only known ignition tool is guarded deep inside ancient pyramids found in only two locations of the world, where torch-bearing zombies roam.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Wields a random pickaxe to mine through your defense.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>50 (non-biting)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720 + 1400 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Attacks accumulate mining progress against defensive plants, insta-killing the plant with it reaches 100%. 
<color=black>•</color> Mining progress = (number of attacks × pickaxe damage) / plant HP.
<color=black>•</color> On appearance, randomly receives a pickaxe with different pickaxe powers. When targeting plants with Toughness below their pickaxe powers, pickaxe damage is multiplied by 5.
<color=black>•</color>Pickaxe Types:
	Gold Pickaxe: 150 damage | 4000 power
	Iron Pickaxe: 50 damage | 16000 power
	Diamond Pickaxe: 100 damage | 32000 power
<color=black>•</color> Defensive plants: Nuts, Pumpkins, Burger Blaster, Pearmafrost.</color>

zombies.name: Dolphinhead Newspaper Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>He once dreamed of becoming a mermaid, but the surgeon who was supposed to fix him got his top and bottom halves completely mixed up.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Gets angry when reading is interrupted... then goes home to fetch another tabloid.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720 + 720 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>After losing his tabloid, greatly increases speed and reverses direction. Upon exiting on the right, spawns a brand new Dolphinhead Newspaper Zombie. This does not trigger if he's hypnotized.</color>

zombies.name: Dolphinhead Football Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>This guy moves like a fish in water on the football field. Wait! It's supposed to be a metaphor! Who said you could flood the lawn!?</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Moves across the field with nimble strides, eager to show off his stylish helmet.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>720 + 1400 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Ignores plant collision while wearing his helmet. Upon reaching the first column or the edge of the lawn, he restores all HP, equips a new helmet, and reverses direction.</color>

zombies.name: Furling
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Though just a cub, Furling has big dreams — to dominate the tundra like the mighty Elder Snowfur, not hang around with mischievous Imp Zombies. It ran off from camp to make a name for itself… and accidentally rolled into the plants' territory. Oof!</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A baby Snowfur that loves to tumble, but rarely survives it.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>300</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Rolls forward. Upon hitting a plant, deals damage equal to its current HP, then dies.
<color=black>•</color> Has a 2/3 chance to evade attacks.</color>

zombies.name: Buckshoot-copter Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Faced with doubts from fellow zombies, Buckshoot-copter tried to prove his veteran status with an old group photo. "But… where are you in this?" they asked. He stared at the black-and-white film, just as puzzled.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Buckshooter Zombie on rotor.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>80/1.5s</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350 + 500 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Immune to Blover. Fires buckshot peas at your defense, these can knock back hypnotized zombies. </color>

zombies.name: Doom-shroom Zombie
zombies.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>The zombies have had enough of being blown to ashes by Doom explosions. Now they've finally built a nuclear counterattack weapon to make the plants suffer for a change. Although a zombie's body can only carry a third of the Doom-shroom's full payload, it's still better than nothing, right?

- Written by Mr. Etc.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Doom-shroom zombie? Aw man!

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1350</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Self-destructs after a while and creates an Doom-shroom explosion that deals 1800 damage to plants in a 3×3 area.
<color=black>Weakness: </color><color=#4B0082>Doom-nut</color>

zombies.name: Grounded Sharkmarine</size>
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Why is it here? Did it emerge from the groud? Or did it fall from the sky? No one really knows. What is certain is that those displaced dirt looking thingies are definitely camouflage.</color></size>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A failed example of a Sharkmarine test.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>20/0.02s</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>Giga Mecha-nut HP/3</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Sharkmarine, but on land and immobile. Using a Wall-nut seedpacket on a Giga Mecha-nut summons a hypnotized Sharkmarine. The Grounded Sharkmarine dies instantly if the Giga Mecha-nut summons again or is destroyed.</color></size>

zombies.name: <color=#4B0082><u>びっくり箱の女王</u>
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The Queen's gaze alone is enough to make her servants tremble. None dare defy her. But power is not her only delight—she loves to give. Within her ornate gift box, toys and trinkets await young hands... along with bombs primed to surprise. And oh, how she loves surprises.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>びっくり箱の女王 is very keen on creating "explosive scenes."

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>48000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Mini-boss. Immune to being hypnotized or devoured.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants.
<color=black>•</color> Explodes on death, dealing physical damage.
<color=black>•</color> Emerges from her box at regular intervals, causing one of the following effects at random:
1. Summons Clown-in-the-Box zombies on every tile of the fifth column and each column to its right.
2. Same but summons Clown-in-the-Pogo Zombies instead.
3. Release an explosion in her column, dealing physical damage.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Buckshot Commando
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Giga Buckshot Commando is a warrior made of iron — iron body, iron will, iron bullets, and an ironic attitude towards complaints from his colleagues. He firmly believes that the zombies being knocked back by his bullets must simply lack the kind of iron-refining training he’s undergone.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>An unstoppable warrior. Fearless and peerless.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>80/0.1s</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Immune to Knock backs. Fires buckshot peas at your defense at a ridiculous rate, these can knock back hypnotized zombies. </color>

zombies.name: アルファアサシン部隊
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The アルファアサシン部隊 moves like shadows, striking faster than a breath and leaving no trace behind—except for the occasional zombie body, of course. They never miss a target, and they never leave anyone alive to tell the tale.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Typically operating in pairs, with elite members deploying as a full squad when necessary.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>500 × 2</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to being hypnotized. Appear in pairs. When appearing as a miniboss, 5 spawn in one lane at once, with their health increased by 5×.
<color=black>•</color> If they take fatal damage while any member of the group is still alive, they become incapacitated. Otherwise, the whole squad dies simultaneously.
<color=black>•</color> While incapacitated, they're immune to damage and knockback (only for the first occasion), block projectiles, but won't be targeted by plants.
<color=black>•</color> After 10s of incapacitation, they revive with full health, charge forward 2.5 tiles, dealing 500 damage to all plants they collide with, and trigger a Jack-in-the-Box Explosion.
<color=black>•</color> If killed by Chompers or other insta-kill methods, both they and their squad immediately perish.</color>
<color=black>Odyssey Modifiers:
</color><color=#4B0082>1. Now always invincible when incapacitated.
2. Can now appear as a Mini-boss.</color>

zombies.name: Frost Tall-nut Sentinel Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Clad in armor forged from solid ice, wielding a blade tempered by fire and frost, Frost Tall-nut Sentinel Zombie returns to the lawn stronger and sharper than ever—only to smash through… zombies ahead of him?</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Frost Tall-nut Zombies with icy claws. They pack a punch.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>270 + 1100 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Inherits traits from Frost Tall-nut Zombie. Transformed from regular zombies by Doominator-shroom and Thornminator.</color>

zombies.name: <color=#4B0082><u>Ice-borg Executrix Mk. Alpha</u>
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>With blades of ice and a cloak of blizzard, she carves statues from shattered flesh and molds divine power with unyielding will. An artificial deity, a specter of the tundra. When hell reunites us, will she remember this land of sorrow?</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Sovereign of the Frozen Tundra.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>1000</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>64000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Mini-boss. Immune to chill, knock-backs and stuns.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants. Attacks freeze plants for 5s. 
<color=black>•</color> Upon entering, performs a slash that damages all plants in front (can be protected by Pumpkin), then releases 5 snowballs around her lane, each damaging a 3×3 area.
<color=black>•</color> Afterwards, slashes or performs a normal attack every 3s — lower HP increases chance for slash.
<color=black>•</color> Normal attacks launch 4 ice swords forward.
<color=black>•</color> On Snow map, has a chance to summon a blizzard instantly.</color>

zombies.name: ガトリングチェリー学者ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"There's always more to life than just math puzzles… like the reed outside the window… or tonight’s moonlight," mumbles ガトリングチェリー学者ゾンビ. "But first, I really need to solve this Sudoku. It's… surprisingly hard."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Fires a rapid barrage of explosive cherry rounds when angered.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>400 (bite) 1000 (explosive cherry)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>1500 + 1500 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from Scholar Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> After losing his paper, fires 4 explosive cherry bullets every 0.5s.</color>

zombies.name: ガトリングチェリー学士ゾンビ
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A renowned demolition lecturer at Zombie International University, ガトリングチェリー学士ゾンビ only agreed to come after Professor Cherryz promised three things: cherry pie, big explosions, and Zuma. "Good ol' Cherryz wasn't wrong," he says.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Fires cherry bullets even before getting angry.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>400 (bite) 1000 (explosive cherry)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> Fires 4 explosive cherries every 1.5s even before losing his newspaper.</color>

zombies.name: Gatling Cherry Doctor Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>To advance in explosive sciences, Gatling Cherry Doctor Zombie is heading abroad. His cherry pie stash strapped to his back? Just part of being prepared.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Graduated magna cum bombis — ready to show it.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>400 (bite) 1000 (explosive cherry)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> When angered, picks up his ammo pack and fires 1 extra cherry every 0.5s.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Football Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Tired of the spotlight, Giga Football Zombie swapped out his bright red jersey for a pitch-black one that blends into the night. Unfortunately, the new look makes him resemble a bank robber more than a footballer.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A linebacker geared for stealth.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Football-nut Elite Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Emerging from the depths of an eerie realm, Giga Football-nut Elite Zombie is a living mystery. He embodies being dark, dangerous, and disoriented. Even he can't recall his origins, only that the past feels like a lucid dream that fades with dawn.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A hardened warrior, fearless in the dark.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie. 
<color=black>•</color> Regenerates 5% max HP every 3s.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Football-nut Leader Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Right-hand zombie to the Striker, Giga Football-nut Leader is admired by subordinates and trusted by command. He's loyal, skilled, and confused why commendations never come in the form of fresh brains.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Tears through the frontlines with ruthless power.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>200 (bite)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>24000 + 24000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> Immune to knockback, chill, and butter.
<color=black>•</color> Bites disable plant healing and make victims receive triple damage for 1s.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Buckshot Leader Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Feared on the battlefield, beloved off it. Giga Buckshot Leader dazzles troops with his signature trick: hiding bullets in his banner.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Suppressive fire that doesn't cease.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>200 (bite) 80/0.1s (buckshot)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>24000 + 24000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Immune to knockback, chill, and butter.</color>

zombies.name: Sergeant Michael Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Zombie pop idol and fan-favorite, Sergeant Michael Zombie can't go anywhere without a swarm of screaming fans. He's learning new moves not just for his global tour, but to dodge fangirls.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Enters in moonwalk with backup dancers.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Enters with 3s moonwalk, then summons 4 Super Dancing Pole Vaulters.</color>

zombies.name: Commander Michael Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>At the peak of fame, power, and performance, Commander Michael Zombie just needs a stage to share his joy with the world.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Moonwalks in style, then rallies the crowd.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Enters with a 3s sliding moonwalk. On reaching 4th column or being blocked, ends moonwalk and then summons 4 Super Dancing Pole Vaulters.</color>

zombies.name: General Michael Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Dashing steps, haunting twirls. The dance prodigy has outgrown the Edgar Academy. Now, fresh from Jackson Dance Academy, he's shooting an MV with his bodyguard's help. Don't forget to film his signature 45° bow — if you survive.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Stylish arrival, dazzling encore.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Ignores plants for 3s while sliding in with a moonwalk to the 4th column. Then summons 8 Super Dancing Pole Vaulters.</color>

zombies.name: Sharkmarine-X
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A knockoff developed by a rival of Gfishtus Corps. It's said to perform identically to the original, but Gfishtus insists this model leaks.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Edgar's latest mass-produced submarine unit.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Moves swiftly in water lanes, crushing any plants in its path.</color>

zombies.name: Destroyer Sharkmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Flawless" weapons are overrated. A true victory lies in overwhelming missile fire raining from the skies. This modified mine-layer submarine functions as a mobile underwater missile silo, the starter of that fire.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Lobs bombs nonstop at the frontline.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Fires 1 bomb every 1.5s aimed at 2 tiles ahead. The bomb explodes like a Jack-in-the-Box explosion but can be shot down if it takes 1000 damage mid-air.</color>

zombies.name: Charger Sharkmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>This turbo-powered sub's sole purpose: charge into and disrupt enemy lines, creating weak spots for allies to attack. Critics say it sacrifices too much for speed, but Edgar shrugs—"All I need is moving forward, at all costs."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Blitzes the water lanes at reckless speed.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Rushes down water lane plants with extreme speed.</color>

zombies.name: Boomer Sharkmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The ultimate battlefield dominator, this submarine is the brainchild of Edgar and Gfishtus Corps. After solving the missile flooding issue, it's now flawless, except for seaweed occasionally jamming the propeller.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Rises to bombard the backline with cruise missiles.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Enters the field submerged. Surfaces when there are plants in its lane and stops moving.
<color=black>•</color> While surfaced, fires 2 missiles every 1.5s aimed at the last column. The missile explodes like a Jack-in-the-Box explosion but can be shot down if it takes 1000 damage mid-air.</color>

zombies.name: Narwhalmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Edgar's proudest innovation, designed for maximum acceleration. All crew must pass brutal G-force centrifuge tests. "It's like ten Gargantuars sat on you," says one survivor.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>The steel spear of the water lanes.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Charges at extreme speed, cutting through water lane plants.
<color=black>•</color> Once per unit, doubles movement speed of all zombies in a 3×3 area (stackable up to 2 times).</color>

zombies.name: Giga Trident Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Wearing waterproof overalls and wielding a shiny trident, he's ready to fish. Don't forget the helmet — it's less for protection from plants, more for defense against jealous fishermen.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Throws tridents at your backline.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> 6-9s after entering or when blocked, throws 4 tridents at the last column.
<color=black>•</color> Each trident causes damage to plants equal to 20% (minimum of 60) of their current Toughness.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Trident-nut Firstmate Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Armed with eye drops and a reinforced Tallnut helmet, he's ready to spear the catch of the day, or his rivals.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>You can't dodge what he targets.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> 6-9s after entering or when blocked, throws 8 tridents at random plants 4 tiles ahead (unaffected by Umbrellas).
<color=black>•</color> Base trident damage +100.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Trident-nut Captain Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A mighty warrior once slated for forklift duty — until he failed the helmet size test. So now he simply hurls more tridents, harder.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Tridents rain down in scattershot.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> 6-9s after entering or when blocked, throws 12 cluster tridents.
<color=black>•</color> Splits into 1 extra trident for each plant 4 tiles ahead. 
<color=black>•</color> Base trident damage +300.</color>

zombies.name: Netherite Miner Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>With a netherite pickaxe and forged mining license, this zombie set off to strike a coal deal with Queen Endoflame — though Piglin Corp's Wither Skeleton trafficking ring might prove stiff competition.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Fastest digger in the Nether mines.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Each attack adds 2000 mining progress to the plant. If mining progress exceeds the plant's HP, the plant is instantly destroyed.</color>

zombies.name: Netherite Driller Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Praised at excavation contests for his lava-fueled netherite drill. Though he always forgets to mention that his hoe is also netherite, the dedication!</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Digs tunnels but gets easily lost.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Each attack adds 4000 mining progress to the plant.
<color=black>•</color> Digs underground and his drill cannot be pulled by Magnet-shrooms while underground.
<color=black>•</color> Emerges randomly between columns 2-8.</color>

zombies.name: Netherite Excavator Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Head of the Zombie's Nether Mining Bureau followed by hundreds of eager, labor-worthy zombies, he dreams of a mining empire. Edgar scoffs: "He just keeps tunneling into other zombies' graves since he's blinded by his helmet. That's why they're always chasing him."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Leads other zombies underground in one big dig.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Each attack adds 8000 mining progress to the plant.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> Enters underground with nearby non-vehicle zombies. They emerge together later.</color>

zombies.name: Plated Michael Zomboni
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Charge, charge again, crush everything! The Zomboni plows through the field with unstoppable momentum, until it met the pond in the middle of the lawn.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Disco zombie driving a reinforced vehicle.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants. Has a 50% damage reduction.
<color=black>•</color> Spawns a standard Michael Zombie upon death.</color>

zombies.name: Armored Michael Zomboni
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"We've added more layers to the front armor!" The newly refurbished vehicle is now the pride of Michael Zombie, though he regrets that the gaps between the armor layers still aren't wide enough to stuff in more backup dancers.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Michael Zombie's vehicle now includes an extra layer of light armor.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants. Has a 66% damage reduction.
<color=black>•</color> Spawns a Plated Michael Zomboni upon death.</color>

zombies.name: Colossus Michael Zomboni
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>This vehicle's extremely thick armor has earned it the nickname "Battleship on Land". Lately, Michael Zombie has come up with yet another bold new design: swap the base for treads, install a multi-layer turret, and mount a long-barreled cannon. He believes this will be a truly original invention.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Michael zombie's vehicle now includes two layers of heavy steel armor.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>24000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants. Has a 75% damage reduction.
<color=black>•</color> Spawns a Armored Michael Zomboni upon death.</color>

zombies.name: Knight Clown-in-the-Pogo Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Don't bother him—he's in love. He's not in the mood to hear your pessimistic take on his romance, and if you try, you'll be met with an explosively emotional response.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Pogo zombie with a modern explosive-loaded pogo stick. Only slightly magnetic and difficult to disarm.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits Pogo Zombie traits.
<color=black>•</color> Does not lose pogo stick if knocked back by Umbrellas.
<color=black>•</color> If killed while still holding the stick, triggers a Jack-in-the-Box explosion.</color>

zombies.name: King Clown-in-the-Pogo Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>He once struggled with poor sales of pogo sticks, watermelons, and jack-in-the-boxes. So he consulted Catapult Zombie. "You've got to imagine the watermelon and jack-in-the-box as one," the advice went. Judging by the explosive success, it worked.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Equipped with a single-use charger for his explosive pogo stick.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits the traits of Knight Clown-in-the-Pogo Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> If spawned on the right half of the field, charges up for 5s and then makes a long leap of about 4 tiles.</color>

zombies.name: Emperor Clown-in-the-Pogo Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After much time, he's finally overcome the pain of his breakup. Now he's dressed in flashy colors and ready to court a new goddess. He's now pursuing びっくり箱の女王. Hopefully, his emotional stamina has improved.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>With an upgraded charging system, the smoke from his explosive pogo stick masks his decoy stand-in.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits the traits of King Clown-in-the-Pogo Zombie but charging duration is reduced to 0.75s.
<color=black>•</color> Can cheat death if holding his pogo stick.</color>

zombies.name: Kirov Bomber
zombies.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>Since top-of-the-line parts aren't windfall, Gfishtus Corps thought it would be cost efficient to make a simplified model for lower scale attacks. Though ultimately they just made an airship that is uncannily similar to Dr. Zomboss' original model...

- Written by Mr. Etc.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A Kirov airship that periodically drops Jack-in-the-Box bombs.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>500/1.5s</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crashes after taking 20 hits from Magnetar stars.</color>

zombies.name: Kirov Mothership
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The Kirov mothership is a core product of Gfishtus Corps, and the company claims it uses cutting-edge drone technology. But if you examine the debris of its minions closely, you'll often find "CCCP" painted in red.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>An aerial mothership that deploys Kirovs Drones.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Every ~2 seconds, summons a Kirov Drone with 0.1× its own HP.
<color=black>•</color> Crashes after taking 30 hits from Magnetar stars.</color>

zombies.name: Kirov Flagship
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>High-altitude infiltration! Integrated recon and assault! Total firepower coverage! Fully digitalized unmanned combat! Gfishtus Corps proudly presents Kirov 2.0! It's the ultimate beast , except for the ridiculously short flight range that relegates it to being a mere frigate under a larger mothership. The mothership, of course, is sold separately.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>An aerial supremacy that deploys rapid carpet bombers.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>300/1.5s</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Every ~4 seconds, summons 2 Supersonic Bombers to quickly decimate the lane.
<color=black>•</color> Crashes after taking 40 hits from Magnetar stars.</color>

zombies.name: ソワソワキョンシー
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Born into poverty, I was fortunate to be sponsored by a wealthy patron and gained an education. I later served as an upright official, speaking frankly at court. People said the Emperor was a tyrant, yet though he ignored my counsel, he never punished me. Only later did I learn: the Emperor was deaf.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A reanimated spirit that explodes upon death, harming all green life in its wake.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>250 (non-bite)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> When killed by damage, deals 125 damage to all plants in a 3×3 area.</color>

zombies.name: 不滅キョンシー
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The night wraith soared, scattering all allies. Two plants stood in its path. Enraged, it struck — one fell, and the other tried to resist. The wraith burst forward, piercing both, and finished them off with brutal strikes. Brave they were, but both perished in an instant. What more could they do? Laughable.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A phantasmal spectre that cuts through barriers with ghostly force.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>500 (non-bite)</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Every 4-8 seconds, dashes forward for up to 2 tiles, ignoring plants and dealing damage.
<color=black>•</color> When killed by damage, deals 250 damage to all plants in a 3×3 area.</color>

zombies.name: 永遠キョンシー
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Li Chi-hsing, a native of Fengdu, once said as a boy, "I can see a jade seal there — it belongs to my family." Everyone laughed. At 24, amid famine, he rose in rebellion and declared himself king of Fengdu. When he received the jade seal, it scorched his face. The next year brought another famine. He was ousted, barely escaping with his life. His tongue wounded by the seal, when asked his name, he could only mumble: "I'm Li..ch.."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A wraith that phases through plants and strikes with imperial wrath.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#4B0082>300/1.5s</color>
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> On the right side of the lawn, every 4-8 seconds, phases through up to 4 tiles ignoring plants, reaching as far into the row as possible and dealing damage along the way. If no bypassable plants are present, dashes forward 1 tile instead.
<color=black>•</color> On the left side, attempting to phase disables this skill.
<color=black>•</color> When killed by damage, deals 500 damage to all plants in a 3×3 area.</color>

zombies.name: Trident Light Hwacha
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"When pear blossoms bloom across the land, the river flows beneath soft gauze." Trident Light Hwacha read this ballad in a yellowing book, moved by the legend behind it. Unfortunately, it did not understand that rockets need engines to fly far.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Unleashes a small wave of tridents.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Attacks by firing 4 tridents at once, can reload and fire again once, then resumes moving forward and crushing plants. Tridents land 5-7 tiles ahead.</color>

zombies.name: Trident Medium Hwacha
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Training with the Trident Medium Hwacha involves unique precision drills. Since the tridents can't change trajectory mid-air, the driver must reposition the entire cart for aiming. "Adjust slightly… more… just a bit—" Splash! The cart tumbles into a nearby pond.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Unleashes a larger wave of tridents.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits of Trident Light Hwacha but fires 14 tridents per salvo.</color>

zombies.name: Trident Heavy Hwacha
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A veteran trident warrior, decorated and seasoned, has joined the Hwacha Division as its newest unit. He has hunted Snowfurs in the tundra and fought crocodiles in the swamps. Now he stands before you, ready to battle. Let's see — can you dodge this?</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Unleashes tridents that scatter on death.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits of Trident Medium Hwacha.
<color=black>•</color> Upon death, unused tridents scatter randomly within 3.5 tiles in its lane, damaging all plants hit.</color>
